disclaimer: Unofficial tool. Information may change. The organizer's information is authoritative.
hero_subtitle: Rate DJs, mark favorites, and keep track of your festival weekend — no account, no tracking.
hero_onboarding: How it works: ⭐ Rate DJs → ❤️ Mark favorites → 🎧 Go to the festival prepared
intro: Find out which DJs really fit you. Explore the Tomorrowland lineup, rate acts, mark favorites, and plan your weekend — private, no login, no tracking.
plan_note: 🗓️ Your prep is running — day planning coming soon
support_text: If Festival Planner helps you, you can optionally support the project.
planner_note_intro: Export and import your ratings here.
privacy_note: All ratings and favorites are stored locally in your browser only. No login, no cloud, no tracking.
